name: Zero gravity friends!
description:
A fast paced party game, where you all fly through the rooms and shoot each other down, doing all this with one button.

How to play: 

Each player has one button to control his charecter.

when standing on a wall press the button to jump in the direction of the arrow.

press mid-jump to shoot at the direction of the arrow.

Watch out! shooting the gun recoils you in the opposite direction.

Hold to button to slow the rotation speed of the arrow.

Don't forget to Grab extra ammo and powerups.
